20.701 Pengendara Ditindak dalam 14 Hari Operasi Zebra Kalimaya Banten
06 Nov 2019, 11:27 by Bahtiar Rifa'i
Serang - Sebanyak 20.701 pelanggar lalu lintas ditindak dalam 14 hari Operasi Zebra Kalimaya. Pelanggar lalu lintas didominasi pengendara kendaraan roda dua.
"Pelanggar pengendara roda dua ini karena mereka tidak memiliki kelengkapan surat motor, tak menggunakan helm, berkendara di bawah umur, tak mematuhi rambu lalu lintas, tak memiliki SIM dan melawan arah" ungkap Dirlantas Polda Banten Kombes Wibowo dalam keterangan, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Dia merinci para pelanggar terdiri dari kendaraan roda dua sebanyak 12.308, mobil penumpang 2.114,, bus sebanyak 236, mobil barang 744, dan kendaraan khusus 32. Mereka ditindak dalam Operasi Zebra Kalimaya yang digelar pada 23 Oktober-5 November 2019.
Wibowo mengatakan pelanggaran terjadi di wilayah Polresta Tangerang dengan 6.170 pelanggaran sementara di Lebak sebanyak 4.003 pelanggaran.


Pelanggar didominasi pengendara kendaraan roda dua (Foto: Dok. Istimewa)

Dari data operasi ini, pelanggar lalu lintas di bawah umur 15 tahun juga meningkat. Pada 2018, ada 240 pelanggar lalu lintas di bawah umur. Namun pada 2019 terjadi peningkatan sampai 2.328 pengendara. Atas temuan peningkatan jumlah pelanggar ini, kepolisian meminta warga untuk mentaati aturan berlalu lintas.
"Tertib lalu lintas ini menjamin keselamatan diri sendiri dan orang lain. Kecelakaan terjadi karena pelanggaran lalu lintas," pungkasnya.

20,701 Motorists Arrested in 14 Days of Operation Zebra Kalimaya Banten
Nov 6 2019, 11:27 by Bahtiar Rifa'i
Serang - A total of 20,701 traffic violators were dealt with within 14 days of Operation Zebra Kalimaya. Traffic violators are dominated by two-wheeled motorists.
"Violators of these two-wheeled riders because they do not have complete motorbike certificates, do not use helmets, drive underage, do not obey traffic signs, do not have a driver's license and go against the direction" said Banten Police Traffic Director Commissioner Wibowo in a statement on Wednesday (6/11) / 2019).
He detailed the violators consisting of 12,308 two-wheeled vehicles, 2,114 passenger cars, 236 buses, 744 freight cars, and 32 special vehicles. They were prosecuted in Operation Zebra Kalimaya which was held on October 23-November 5, 2019.
Wibowo said violations occurred in the Tangerang Police area with 6,170 temporary violations in Lebak totaling 4,003 violations.


Offenders are dominated by two-wheeled motorists (Photo: Special Doc.)

From this operating data, traffic violators under the age of 15 also increased. In 2018, there were 240 underage traffic violators. But in 2019 there was an increase to 2,328 motorists. Upon finding an increase in the number of offenders, the police asked residents to obey traffic rules.
"This orderly traffic guarantees the safety of themselves and others. Accidents occur because of traffic violations," he concluded.
